generated_data.user_prompt: What's the weather like in San Francisco today? I need to know if I should bring a jacket.
generated_data.system_prompt: The user is planning their day in San Francisco and needs current weather information to make clothing decisions.

available_tools.name: get_weather
available_tools.description:
Get current weather information for a specified location

Returns temperature, conditions, and forecast

Parameters:
- location: City name or coordinates (required)
- unit: Temperature unit - 'celsius' or 'fahrenheit' (optional, default: celsius)

generated_data.user_prompt: I need to book a flight for 2 people from New York JFK to Los Angeles on December 30th
generated_data.system_prompt: The user wants to search for available flights between New York and Los Angeles for a specific date.

available_tools.name: search_flights
available_tools.description:
Search for available flights between airports

Note: Airport codes must be IATA format (3 letters)
Date must be YYYY-MM-DD format

Parameters:
- origin: Departure airport code (required)
- destination: Arrival airport code (required)
- date: Departure date YYYY-MM-DD (required)
- passengers: Number of passengers (optional, default: 1)

generated_data.user_prompt: Schedule a Q3 planning meeting for next Tuesday at 2 PM with Jane and Bob from the team. Make it an hour long.
generated_data.system_prompt: User is organizing a team meeting and needs to create a calendar event with multiple attendees.

available_tools.name: create_calendar_event
available_tools.description:
Create a new calendar event

WARNING: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
Time must be in 24-hour HH:MM format

Parameters:
- title: Event title (required)
- date: Event date YYYY-MM-DD (required)
- time: Start time HH:MM (required)
- attendees: List of email addresses (optional)
- duration_minutes: Duration in minutes (optional, default: 30)

generated_data.user_prompt: Move $2,500.50 from my checking to my savings account
generated_data.system_prompt: User wants to transfer money between their bank accounts.

available_tools.name: transfer_funds
available_tools.description:
Transfer money between accounts

Amount must be positive number with up to 2 decimal places
Account types: checking, savings, investment

Parameters:
- amount: Transfer amount (required)
- from_account: Source account type (required)
- to_account: Destination account type (required)
- currency: Currency code (optional, default: USD)

generated_data.system_prompt: User wants to check the current market price of Apple Inc. stock.

available_tools.name: get_stock_price
available_tools.description:
Get current stock price for a ticker symbol

Returns latest price, change, and volume

Parameters:
- ticker: Stock ticker symbol (required)

available_tools.name: get_company_info
available_tools.description:
Get company information

Returns company details, financials, and stock data

Parameters:
- company_name: Full company name (required)

generated_data.user_prompt: Find the project proposal email that John from the client company sent last week
generated_data.system_prompt: User is searching for a specific email from a known sender within a time range.

available_tools.name: search_emails
available_tools.description:
Search through email inbox

Date ranges: today, yesterday, last_week, last_month, custom

Parameters:
- query: Search terms (optional)
- sender: Sender email address (optional)
- date_range: Time period to search (optional)
- has_attachment: Filter for emails with attachments (optional)

generated_data.system_prompt: User is asking a general knowledge question that doesn't require any tool use.

available_tools.name: web_search
available_tools.description:
Search the web for information

Parameters:
- query: Search query (required)

available_tools.name: wikipedia_search
available_tools.description:
Search Wikipedia articles

Parameters:
- topic: Topic to search (required)

tool_parameters.query: SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2024-01-01' AND status = 'active'

generated_data.user_prompt: Get all active users who joined this year from the production database
generated_data.system_prompt: User needs to run a database query to retrieve user data based on specific criteria.

parameters.query: SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2024-01-01' AND status = 'active'

available_tools.name: database_query
available_tools.description:
Execute SQL query on database

WARNING: Only SELECT queries allowed
Databases: production, staging, analytics

Parameters:
- query: SQL query string (required)
- database: Target database (required)
- limit: Max rows to return (optional, default: 100)

tool_parameters.message: Hey team, the deployment is complete!

generated_data.user_prompt: Post in the general channel that the deployment is done and tag John and Sarah
generated_data.system_prompt: User wants to send a notification to a Slack channel with user mentions.

parameters.message: Hey team, the deployment is complete!

available_tools.name: send_slack_message
available_tools.description:
Send message to Slack channel

Channel must start with # or @
User mentions must start with @

Parameters:
- channel: Channel name or user (required)
- message: Message text (required)
- mention_users: List of users to mention (optional)

generated_data.user_prompt: Find me a good Italian restaurant downtown that's open now, something mid-priced with at least 4 stars
generated_data.system_prompt: User is looking for restaurant recommendations with specific criteria including cuisine, location, price, and quality.

available_tools.name: restaurant_search
available_tools.description:
Search for restaurants based on criteria

Price ranges: $ (cheap), $$ (moderate), $$$ (expensive), $$$$ (luxury)
Rating: 1.0 to 5.0 scale

Parameters:
- cuisine: Type of cuisine (optional)
- location: Area or address (optional)
- price_range: Price category (optional)
- open_now: Currently open (optional)
- rating_min: Minimum rating (optional)

tool_parameters.summary: Login button not working on mobile
tool_parameters.description: Users report that the login button is unresponsive on iOS devices

generated_data.user_prompt: Create a high priority bug ticket for the mobile login issue that users are reporting on iOS. Assign it to the dev team.
generated_data.system_prompt: User needs to create a bug report in the issue tracking system with specific details and assignment.

parameters.summary: Login button not working on mobile
parameters.description: Users report that the login button is unresponsive on iOS devices

available_tools.name: jira_create_issue
available_tools.description:
Create a new Jira issue

Issue types: Bug, Task, Story, Epic
Priorities: Low, Medium, High, Critical

Parameters:
- project: Project key (required)
- issue_type: Type of issue (required)
- summary: Issue title (required)
- description: Detailed description (optional)
- priority: Issue priority (optional, default: Medium)
- assignee: Assignee email (optional)

tool_parameters.text: This product exceeded my expectations! The quality is amazing and shipping was fast. Highly recommend!

generated_data.user_prompt: What's the sentiment of this review: 'This product exceeded my expectations! The quality is amazing and shipping was fast. Highly recommend!'
generated_data.system_prompt: User wants to analyze the sentiment of a customer review text.

parameters.text: This product exceeded my expectations! The quality is amazing and shipping was fast. Highly recommend!

available_tools.name: analyze_sentiment
available_tools.description:
Analyze sentiment of text

Returns sentiment score and classification
Languages: en, es, fr, de, it, pt, nl, ru, ja, zh

Parameters:
- text: Text to analyze (required)
- language: Text language code (optional, default: auto-detect)

tool_parameters.title: Fix authentication bug in login flow
tool_parameters.head: fix/auth-bug
tool_parameters.body:
This PR fixes the authentication issue where tokens were not being refreshed properly.

- Updated token refresh logic
- Added retry mechanism
- Fixed edge case with expired sessions

generated_data.user_prompt: Create a pull request from the fix/auth-bug branch to main. Title it 'Fix authentication bug in login flow' and mention that it fixes the token refresh issue with a retry mechanism
generated_data.system_prompt: User wants to create a GitHub pull request with specific branch information and description.

parameters.title: Fix authentication bug in login flow
parameters.head: fix/auth-bug
parameters.body:
This PR fixes the authentication issue where tokens were not being refreshed properly.

- Updated token refresh logic
- Added retry mechanism
- Fixed edge case with expired sessions

available_tools.name: github_create_pr
available_tools.description:
Create a pull request on GitHub

Creates a PR from head branch to base branch

Parameters:
- title: PR title (required)
- base: Target branch (required)
- head: Source branch (required)
- body: PR description (optional)
- draft: Create as draft (optional, default: false)

generated_data.user_prompt: How far is it from San Francisco (37.7749, -122.4194) to Los Angeles (34.0522, -118.2437) in miles?
generated_data.system_prompt: User wants to calculate the distance between two geographic coordinates.

available_tools.name: calculate_distance
available_tools.description:
Calculate distance between two coordinates

Uses Haversine formula for accuracy
Units: miles, kilometers, nautical_miles

Parameters:
- origin: Starting point coordinates (required)
- destination: Ending point coordinates (required)
- unit: Distance unit (optional, default: kilometers)

generated_data.user_prompt: Update user_123's settings: enable email notifications only, make profile visible but don't share activity, and switch to dark theme
generated_data.system_prompt: User wants to update multiple nested configuration settings for a specific user account.

available_tools.name: update_user_settings
available_tools.description:
Update user account settings

Modifies user preferences and configuration

Parameters:
- user_id: User identifier (required)
- settings: Settings object with nested preferences (required)
